Text: Like all AFG uploads this doesn't work on Xbox 360 but does work in standard Phillips dvd player. This should be nuked but seeing how this is a P2P release and the scene moved onto MP4 its a moot point. How I wish that FQM and 2HD still kept releasing xvid avi tv shows like they did the first two months they switched to mp4.

I too really, really hate MP4. Sometimes they will play, most of the time they don't, and I have to wait ages for ettv to upload an avi. How about uploading MP4 and AVI TV Series both at the same time. Please.
